message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $82. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob! I can offer it to you for $81. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $79. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm close to selling to John, Bob! I'm willing to make one last offer. I can sell it to you for $80. It's the best I can do.
